title: Failed to run mlflow project with docker_env
body:
### System information
- **Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in MLflow)**:
- **OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04)**:
- **MLflow installed from (source or binary)**: 
- **MLflow version (run ``mlflow --version``)**:
- **Python version**: 
- **npm version (if running the dev UI):
- **Exact command to reproduce**:

### Describe the problem
Trying to run mlflow project with docker_env yield exception

### Source code / logs
019/05/26 11:34:02 INFO mlflow.projects: === Building docker image mlflow-test-model-v1-ebf1f04 ===
2019/05/26 11:34:04 INFO mlflow.projects: === Created directory /tmp/tmpOnGmBj for downloading remote URIs passed to arguments of type 'path' ===
2019/05/26 11:34:04 INFO mlflow.projects: === Running command 'docker run --rm -v /test_repo/src/research/models/test-model-v1/mlruns:/mlflow/tmp/mlruns -e MLFLOW_TRACKING_URI=/mlflow/tmp/mlruns -e MLFLOW_RUN_ID=4ccf791bab4d48e48f2ad955e0be872e -e MLFLOW_EXPERIMENT_ID=0 mlflow-test-model-v1-ebf1f04 python train.py' in run with ID '4ccf791bab4d48e48f2ad955e0be872e' ===
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "train.py", line 45, in <module>
    with mlflow.start_run():
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/fluent.py", line 115, in start_run
      fixed acidity  volatile acidity  citric acid  residual sugar  chlorides  \

1507                  5.0                  12.0  0.99605  3.36       0.55

644       9.4        5
    active_run_obj = MlflowClient().get_run(existing_run_uuid)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/mlflow/tracking/client.py", line 53, in get_run
    return self.store.get_run(run_id)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/mlflow/store/file_store.py", line 368, in get_run
    run_info = self._get_run_info(run_uuid)
  File "/opt/conda/lib/python2.7/site-packages/mlflow/store/file_store.py", line 384, in _get_run_info
    databricks_pb2.RESOURCE_DOES_NOT_EXIST)
mlflow.exceptions.MlflowException: Run '4ccf791bab4d48e48f2ad955e0be872e' not found
2019/05/26 11:34:08 ERROR mlflow.cli: === Run (ID '4ccf791bab4d48e48f2ad955e0be872e') failed ===
